text: Icy Tower is a freeware computer game. It involves a small avatar (or character) with a winter hat, jumping across platforms in an icy tower. The goal of the game is to climb as high as you can up the tower. The game was released in 2001. It was pretty successful and is known for its fast game pace and funny sounds. title: Icy Tower
